botan.pubkey.algo.ecdsa

ECDSA

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct ECDSAPublicKey;
This class represents ECDSA Public Keys.

this(in ECGroup dom_par, in PointGFp public_point);
Construct a public key from a given public point.

Params:
ECGroup dom_par the domain parameters associated with this key
PointGFp public_point the public point defining this key

struct ECDSAPrivateKey;
This class represents ECDSA Private Keys

this(ref const AlgorithmIdentifier alg_id, ref const SecureVector!ubyte key_bits);
Load a private key

Params:
AlgorithmIdentifier alg_id the X.509 algorithm identifier
SecureVector!ubyte key_bits PKCS #8 structure

this()(RandomNumberGenerator rng, auto ref const ECGroup domain, BigInt x = 0);
Generate a new private key

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator
ECGroup domain parameters to used for this key
BigInt x the private key (if zero, generate a ney random key)

class ECDSASignatureOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Signature;
ECDSA signature operation

class ECDSAVerificationOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Verification;
ECDSA verification operation
